Sept. 29, 2013 D SCABA Autumn Contest (First Section)
SCABA Autumn Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SCABA Autumn Contest scaba-autumn-contest-first-section
The Hawth, Crawley, West Sussex Best Instrumentalist: Rhys Cave (flugel) Thundersley Best Euphonium: Jeffrey Keir, Thundersley Best Basses: Thundersley Conductor's Prize: Kevin Jordan, Fairlop
Sept. 28, 2013, 1:51 p.m. Sept. 30, 2013, 10:04 a.m.
1 Thundersley Brass John Ward Tallis Variations
2 Fulham Brass Band Chris Augustine Royal Parks
3 Tilbury Andrew Austin Diversions - Variations on a Swiss Folk Song
4 Fairlop Brass Kevin Jordan Dimensions
5 Welwyn Garden City Band John Campbell Triumphant Rhapsody
6 Horsham Borough Andrew Kershaw Academic Festival Overture
7 Yiewsley and West Drayton Band Chris Cole Rhapsody in Brass
